lesson: Unit 5 - Advanced Business and Negotiation Terminology

questions.question: Why is precise language vital in negotiations?
answers: To clarify terms and build trust.
questions.correct: To clarify terms and build trust.

questions.question: Why use neutral terms in negotiations?
Why is active listening crucial in negotiations?
